turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey man, can you pick up a Cherry Mocha from Starbucks for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure the Starbucks at 7698 Dorchester Blvd good?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah that's close enough to the office.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of Cherry Mocha do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it a Grande Cherry Mocha

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two percent milk and whipped cream as well

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright one Grande Cherry Mocha, two percent milk, and whipped cream correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No hold up let me ask Josh

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just lemme know when you're ready.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah Josh will take a Short Cappuccino with two percent milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay a Cherry mocha and a Cappuccino right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Right and make sure you get your self something

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do, want me to put it on your account?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know it

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright see you at the office

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, Bye

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye
